content:
# FACTORIO REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position (-5.0, 2.5) with coal fuel
- Steam engine at position (-2.5, 10.5)
- Pipe groups connecting the water and steam systems

### Coal Mining and Transport System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (16.0, 0.0) mining coal
- Wooden chest at position (16.5, 1.5) collecting coal
- Burner inserter at position (16.5, 2.5) moving coal to transport belt
- Second burner mining drill at position (18.0, 21.0) mining coal
- Wooden chest at position (18.5, 22.5) collecting coal
- Burner inserter at position (18.5, 23.5) moving coal to transport belt
- Transport belt system connecting coal to boiler and other systems

### Iron Mining and Smelting System
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position (15.5, 70.5) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace at position (16.0, 73.0) smelting iron ore into plates
- Inserter at position (13.5, 72.5) moving items from furnace
- Wooden chest at position (13.5, 73.5) storing iron plates (contains 224 iron plates)
- Burner inserter at position (14.5, 73.5) moving items from furnace to chest
- Transport belt at position (13.5, 71.5) for output (now facing up/right based on recent changes)

### Copper Mining and Smelting System
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position (-46.5, 72.5) mining copper ore
- Stone furnace at position (-46.0, 75.0) smelting copper ore into plates
- Inserter at position (-48.5, 74.5) moving items from furnace
- Wooden chest at position (-48.5, 75.5) storing copper plates (contains 251 copper plates)
- Burner inserter at position (-47.5, 75.5) moving items from furnace to chest
- Transport belt at position (-48.5, 73.5) for output (now facing up/right based on recent changes)

### Iron Gear Wheel Production
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (13.5, 78.5) crafting iron gear wheels
- Wooden chest at position (11.5, 76.5) for input materials
- Inserter at position (11.5, 77.5) feeding materials to assembler
- Inserter at position (11.5, 78.5) for output
- Inserter at position (15.5, 78.5) for additional input
- Transport belt system connecting to the assembler

### Electronic Circuit Production
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (-48.5, 80.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Inserter at position (-48.5, 78.5) feeding materials to assembler
- Inserter at position (-46.5, 80.5) for additional input
- Wooden chest at position (-45.5, 80.5) storing iron plates for input
- Wooden chest at position (-48.5, 82.5) for output
- Inserter at position (-48.5, 83.5) moving output

### Logistic Science Pack Production
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (11.5, 83.5) crafting logistic science packs
- Inserter at position (11.5, 81.5) feeding materials to assembler
- Wooden chest at position (9.5, 83.5) for input
- Inserter at position (8.5, 83.5) feeding the input chest
- Wooden chest at position (13.5, 83.5) storing transport belts and inserters (contains 4 transport belts and 3 inserters)
- Inserter at position (14.5, 83.5) feeding the materials chest

## ERROR TIPS
